com.neatnodes.utils

Class JSONTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neatnodes.utils.JSONTools

  • public class JSONTools
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods for converting between Genome objects and their JSON representation.
    Author:
    Sam Griffin

    • Method Detail

      • writeGenomeToFile

        public static void writeGenomeToFile(Genome genome,
                                     java.lang.String filePath,
                                     java.lang.String comment)
        Encode a Genome object as a JSON file.
        Parameters:
        genome - The Genome to encode.
        filePath - Path to a JSON file to create.
        comment - Value for a comment field in the output file that can be used to provide meta information about the Genome.

      • readGenomeFromFile

        public static Genome readGenomeFromFile(java.lang.String filePath)
        Parse a JSON file to produce a new Genome object.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path to the JSON file to read from
        Returns:
        The new Genome
